metadata.titleEn: Dataset of characteristic parameters of tropospheric aerosols over the Qinghai Tibet Plateau (2007-2020)
metadata.titleCn: 青藏高原上空对流层气溶胶特征参量数据集（2007-2020）
metadata.description: A comprehensive and robust dataset of tropospheric aerosol properties is important for understanding the effects of aerosol-radiation feedback on the climate system and reducing the uncertainties of climate models. The third pole of Earth (Tibetan Plateau, TP) is highly challenging to obtain long-term in situ aerosol data due to its harsh environmental conditions. Here, we provide more reliable the new vertical aerosol index (AI) parameter from the spaceborne-based Lidar (CALIOP) of CALIPSO over TP during 2007-2020 between daytime and nighttime to investigate the aerosol’s climatology. The calculated vertical AI was derived from the aerosol extinction coefficient (EC), which was rigorously quality-checked and validation, strictly quality checked, and validated for passive satellite sensors (MODIS) and ground-based LIDAR measurements. Generally, all those facts demonstrate the agreement of the AI dataset with the CALIOP and ground-based LIDAR. Besides, all the evidence shows that after removing the low-reliability aerosol target signal, the optimized data can obtain the aerosol characteristics with higher reliability. Our data set also reveals the patterns and numbers of high-altitude vertical structure characteristics of the aerosol troposphere over the TP. Our dataset will help to update and makeup the observational aerosol data in the TP. We encourage climate modeling groups to consider new analyses of the AI vertical patterns, comparing the recovered datasets, with the potential to increase our understanding of the aerosol-cloud-radiation-precipitation interaction and its climate effects.

metadata.instructions: This data based on CALIPSO secondary detection data, provides the qinghai-tibet plateau between 2007 and 2020 on the tropopause height above after rejecting low reliability target of aerosol, get higher reliability characteristics of aerosol parameters and calculate the new aerosol parameters, including 532 nm and 1064 nm of day and night the characteristic parameter of the result (on average), the folder is divided into data set during the day and night.Contains 532 nm and 1064 nm.: Extinction_Coefficient_532_D_1.mat, characterization of aerosol extinction coefficient, 532 on behalf of the wavelength of 532 nm (1064 to 1064 nm), D represents the day (night) N for night during the day, on behalf of the month is January 1; Angstrom AE_D_1. Mat characterization of day 1 month aerosol exponent (AE); AI_532_D_1. Mat characterization of aerosol index (AI); Altitude_532_D_1. mat characterization of vertical sea level information; Alt_layer_D_1. mat characterization of vertical sea level information; AOD_532_D_1. mat characterization of aerosol optical the depth (AOD); AOD_layer_532_D_1. mat characterization of aerosol optical layer the depth information; Lat_D_1. mat characterization of latitude (latitude) information;Surface_Height_532_D_1.mat characterization of the surface height information.All data sets for mat file format, matlab can be read directly.
metadata.instructionsCn: 本数据基于CALIPSO二级探测数据，提供了2007-2020年间青藏高原上空对流层高度上的经过剔除低信度气溶胶目标物后，得到信度更高的气溶胶光学特性参量并计算得到新的气溶胶特征参量（如：AE,AI），包括白天和夜间的532nm与1064nm的特征参量（月平均结果），文件夹分为白天与夜间数据集。均包含532nm和1064nm。分别是：Extinction_Coefficient_532_D_1.mat, 表征气溶胶消光系数，532代表波长为532nm（1064为1064nm），D代表day白天(N代表夜间night），1代表月份即1月；AE_D_1.mat表征白天1月的气溶胶Angstrom exponent（AE）；AI_532_D_1.mat表征aerosol index（AI）；Altitude_532_D_1.mat表征垂直海平面高度信息；Alt_layer_D_1.mat表征垂直海平面高度层信息；AOD_532_D_1.mat表征aerosol optical depth（AOD）；AOD_layer_532_D_1.mat表征aerosol optical depth层信息；Lat_D_1.mat表征纬度（latitude）信息；Surface_Height_532_D_1.mat表征地表高度信息。所有数据集均为mat文件格式，用matlab可直接读取。

background: A comprehensive and robust dataset of tropospheric aerosol properties is important for understanding the effects of aerosol–radiation feedback on the climate system and reducing the uncertainties of climate models. The “Third Pole” of Earth (Tibetan Plateau, TP) is highly challenging for obtaining long-term in situ aerosol data due to its harsh environmental conditions. The TP is known as the “Third Pole” because it has the third largest ice mass on Earth, after the Antarctic and Arctic regions. The TP, also called “Asia’s Water Tower”, provides freshwater to 40 % of the world’s population due to its vast water reserves such as glaciers, lakes, and rivers. Climate projections are simulated responses of the climate system to future emission or concentration scenarios of greenhouse gases (GHGs) and aerosols and are generally calculated using climate models. The most significant uncertainties in predicting future climate change are related to uncertainties in the distribution and properties of aerosols and clouds, their interactions, and limitations in the representation of aerosols and clouds in global climate models. The primary aerosol type over the TP is dust, which is primarily contributed by the Taklimakan Desert. However, the effect of aerosol on the atmospheric energy and water cycle remains uncertain, mainly due to the lack of a long-term and accurate vertical aerosol optical property dataset over the TP region.
research objective: Here, we provide the more reliable new vertical aerosol index (AI) parameter from the spaceborne-based lidar CALIOP (Cloud-Aerosol Lidar with Orthogonal Polarization) on board CALIPSO (Cloud-Aerosol Lidar and Infrared Pathfinder Satellite Observations) for daytime and nighttime to investigate the aerosol’s climatology over the TP region during 2007–2020. We encourage climate modelling groups to consider new analyses of the AI vertical patterns, comparing the more accurate datasets, with the potential to increase our understanding of the aerosol–cloud interaction (ACI) and aerosol–radiation interaction (ARI) and their climate effects.
challenges: The TP is highly challenging for obtaining long-term in situ aerosol data due to its harsh environmental conditions. The effect of aerosol on the atmospheric energy and water cycle remains uncertain, mainly due to the lack of a long-term and accurate vertical aerosol optical property dataset over the TP region.
methods: The calculated vertical AI was derived from the aerosol extinction coefficient (EC), which was rigorously quality-checked and validated for passive satellite sensors (MODIS) and ground-based lidar measurements.
dataset: The dataset used in this study is more effective at characterizing the vertical structure of aerosols while following standardized quality control methods to obtain higher confidence in the aerosol vertical structural property covariate datasets and to allow for comparison and application to the study of climate models and other atmospheric-science-related problems between our records and other different public datasets. The used parameter includes Extinction_Coefficient_532 and Extinction_Coefﬁcient_1064 between daytime and nighttime observations from 2007 to 2020. In addition, we used the ground-based lidar (38.967° N, 83.65° E; 1099.3 m) detection data from the hinterland of the TD to verify the validity and accuracy of the low-conﬁdence aerosol removal method and the AI calculated by CALIOP detection data.
findings: Generally, our results demonstrated that there was agreement of the AI dataset with the CALIOP and ground-based lidar. In addition, the results showed that, after removing the low-reliability aerosol target signal, the optimized data can obtain the aerosol characteristics with higher reliability. The data also reveal the patterns and concentrations of high-altitude vertical structure characteristics of the tropospheric aerosol over the TP.
backgroundCn: 一个全面且强大的对流层气溶胶特性数据集对于理解气溶胶-辐射反馈对气候系统的影响以及减少气候模型的不确定性至关重要。地球的“第三极”（青藏高原，TP）由于其恶劣的环境条件，获取长期的现场气溶胶数据非常具有挑战性。青藏高原被称为“第三极”，因为它是地球上第三大冰盖，仅次于南极和北极地区。青藏高原也被称为“亚洲的水塔”，由于其丰富的水资源，如冰川、湖泊和河流，为世界40%的人口提供淡水。气候预测是气候系统对未来温室气体（GHGs）和气溶胶的排放或浓度情景的模拟响应，通常通过气候模型进行计算。预测未来气候变化时，最显著的不确定性与气溶胶和云的分布及特性、它们的相互作用以及全球气候模型中对气溶胶和云的表征限制有关。青藏高原上主要的气溶胶类型是尘埃，主要来源于塔克拉玛干沙漠。然而，气溶胶对大气能量和水循环的影响仍然不确定，主要是由于缺乏青藏高原地区长期且准确的垂直气溶胶光学特性数据集。
research objectiveCn: 在这里，我们提供了来自CALIPSO（云-气溶胶激光雷达和红外路径卫星观测）上空基激光雷达CALIOP（正交偏振云-气溶胶激光雷达）的更可靠的新垂直气溶胶指数（AI）参数，以研究2007年至2020年间青藏高原地区的气溶胶气候学。我们鼓励气候建模组考虑对AI垂直模式的新分析，比较更准确的数据集，以期加深我们对气溶胶-云相互作用（ACI）和气溶胶-辐射相互作用（ARI）及其气候影响的理解。
challengesCn: 由于青藏 Plateau 的恶劣环境条件，获取长期的原位气溶胶数据非常具有挑战性。气溶胶对大气能量和水循环的影响仍然不确定，主要是由于缺乏该地区长期且准确的垂直气溶胶光学特性数据集。
methodsCn: 计算得到的垂直人工智能是基于气溶胶消光系数（EC）得出的，该系数经过严格的质量检查和验证，适用于被动卫星传感器（MODIS）和地面激光雷达测量。
datasetCn: 本研究中使用的数据集在表征气溶胶的垂直结构方面更为有效，同时遵循标准化的质量控制方法，以获得更高的气溶胶垂直结构属性协变量数据集的可信度，并允许将我们的记录与其他不同公共数据集进行比较和应用于气候模型及其他大气科学相关问题。所使用的参数包括2007年至2020年间白天和夜间观测的532纳米和1064纳米的消光系数。此外，我们使用了位于TD腹地的地基激光雷达（38.967° N，83.65° E；1099.3米）探测数据，以验证低可信度气溶胶去除方法和通过CALIOP探测数据计算的人工智能的有效性和准确性。
findingsCn: 总体而言，我们的结果表明，AI 数据集与 CALIOP 和地面激光雷达的数据一致。此外，结果显示，在去除低可靠性气溶胶目标信号后，优化后的数据能够以更高的可靠性获取气溶胶特征。这些数据还揭示了青藏 Plateau（TP）上空对流层气溶胶的高空垂直结构特征的模式和浓度。

Verification.QuestionEn: Is a dataset available that characterizes the vertical structure of aerosols over the Tibetan Plateau using spaceborne-based lidar data?
Verification.QuestionCn: 是否有可用的数据集，表征青藏高原上空气溶胶的垂直结构，使用基于卫星的激光雷达数据？

Disjunctive.QuestionEn: Which data collection method is more effective for characterizing the vertical structure of aerosols over the Tibetan Plateau, passive satellite sensors (MODIS), ground-based lidar, or spaceborne-based lidar (CALIOP)?
Disjunctive.QuestionCn: 哪种数据收集方法在表征青藏高原上空气溶胶的垂直结构方面更有效，主动卫星传感器（MODIS）、地面激光雷达还是空间激光雷达（CALIOP）？

Disjunctive.QuestionEn: What is the main challenge in obtaining long-term in situ aerosol data over the Tibetan Plateau, harsh environmental conditions or technological limitations?
Disjunctive.QuestionCn: 在青藏高原获取长期原位气溶胶数据的主要挑战是恶劣的环境条件还是技术限制？

Disjunctive.QuestionEn: Which parameter is used to derive the vertical aerosol index for the Tibetan Plateau, the Extinction_Coefficient_532, Extinction_Coefficient_1064, or another method?
Disjunctive.QuestionCn: 哪个参数用于推导青藏高原的垂直气溶胶指数，是使用532纳米的消光系数（Extinction_Coefficient_532）、1064纳米的消光系数（Extinction_Coefficient_1064）还是其他方法？
Disjunctive.AnswerCn: 消光系数_532 和 消光系数_1064

Concept Completion.QuestionEn: What are the new data collection techniques used to gather tropospheric aerosol properties over the Tibetan Plateau?
Concept Completion.QuestionCn: 在青藏高原上收集对流层气溶胶特性的新的数据收集技术有哪些？

Concept Completion.QuestionEn: Where do researchers face challenges in collecting long-term in situ aerosol data, and why?
Concept Completion.QuestionCn: 研究人员在收集长期原位气溶胶数据时面临哪些挑战，以及原因是什么？

Concept Completion.QuestionEn: What dataset parameters are used to study the vertical structure of aerosols over the Tibetan Plateau?
Concept Completion.QuestionCn: 用于研究青藏高原上气溶胶垂直结构的数据集参数有哪些？

Example.QuestionEn: Can you provide an example of a data collection method used to derive the vertical aerosol index (AI) parameter in the Tibetan Plateau?
Example.QuestionCn: 您能否提供一个用于在青藏高原推导垂直气溶胶指数（AI）参数的数据收集方法的例子？
Example.AnswerEn: The vertical aerosol index (AI) parameter is derived using the aerosol extinction coefficient (EC) from spaceborne-based lidar CALIOP on board CALIPSO, which is rigorously quality-checked and validated for passive satellite sensors and ground-based lidar measurements.
Example.AnswerCn: 垂直气溶胶指数（AI）参数是通过使用CALIPSO卫星上搭载的空间激光雷达CALIOP的气溶胶消光系数（EC）得出的，该参数经过严格的质量检查和验证，适用于被动卫星传感器和地面激光雷达测量。

Example.QuestionEn: Could you give an example of a challenge faced in collecting long-term aerosol data in the Tibetan Plateau?
Example.QuestionCn: 在收集青藏高原长期气溶胶数据时面临的一个挑战是数据采集点的稀缺性和高海拔环境对设备的影响。
Example.AnswerEn: A significant challenge in collecting long-term aerosol data in the Tibetan Plateau is the region's harsh environmental conditions, which make it difficult to obtain in situ measurements.
Example.AnswerCn: 在收集青藏高原长期气溶胶数据时，一个重大挑战是该地区恶劣的环境条件，使得获取现场测量变得困难。

Example.QuestionEn: Can you provide an example of a dataset that characterizes the vertical structure of aerosols over the Tibetan Plateau?
Example.QuestionCn: 您能否提供一个描述青藏高原上气溶胶垂直结构的数据集示例？
Example.AnswerEn: A dataset characterizing the vertical structure of aerosols over the Tibetan Plateau includes parameters like Extinction_Coefficient_532 and Extinction_Coefficient_1064, with observations from 2007 to 2020, and employs standardized quality control methods to ensure higher confidence in the data.
Example.AnswerCn: 一个描述西藏高原上气溶胶垂直结构的数据集包括532纳米和1064纳米的消光系数等参数，观测时间从2007年到2020年，并采用标准化的质量控制方法以确保数据的高可信度。

Quantification.QuestionCn: 该数据集覆盖的青藏高原对流层气溶胶特性数据的年份是多少？

Definition.QuestionEn: What is the 'vertical aerosol index (AI)' in the context of tropospheric aerosol studies?
Definition.QuestionCn: 在对流层气溶胶研究中，“垂直气溶胶指数（AI）”是指什么？
Definition.AnswerEn: The 'vertical aerosol index (AI)' is a parameter derived from the aerosol extinction coefficient (EC), used to investigate the climatology of aerosols over the Tibetan Plateau region. It helps characterize the vertical structure of aerosols and is validated against satellite sensors and ground-based LIDAR measurements.
Definition.AnswerCn: “垂直气溶胶指数（AI）”是一个由气溶胶消光系数（EC）衍生的参数，用于研究青藏高原地区气溶胶的气候学。它有助于表征气溶胶的垂直结构，并与卫星传感器和地面激光雷达（LIDAR）测量结果进行了验证。

Comparison.QuestionEn: How does the vertical aerosol index derived from spaceborne-based Lidar compare to ground-based Lidar measurements in terms of reliability and accuracy?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 从空间基激光雷达（Lidar）衍生的垂直气溶胶指数与地面激光雷达测量在可靠性和准确性方面如何比较？
Comparison.AnswerEn: The vertical aerosol index derived from spaceborne-based Lidar, such as CALIOP, has demonstrated agreement with ground-based Lidar measurements. The dataset is more effective at characterizing the vertical structure of aerosols when following standardized quality control methods, and both methods showed that removing low-reliability aerosol target signals can lead to obtaining aerosol characteristics with higher reliability.
Comparison.AnswerCn: 来自空间基激光雷达（如CALIOP）获得的垂直气溶胶指数与地面激光雷达测量结果显示出一致性。该数据集在遵循标准化质量控制方法时，更有效地表征气溶胶的垂直结构，并且两种方法都表明，去除低可靠性气溶胶目标信号可以获得更高可靠性的气溶胶特征。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: What insights can be drawn from the vertical aerosol index about the interaction between aerosols and radiation in the Tibetan Plateau?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 从垂直气溶胶指数中可以得出关于气溶胶与辐射在青藏高原相互作用的洞察。
Interpretation.AnswerEn: The vertical aerosol index provides a more reliable parameter to investigate the aerosol's climatology. It can enhance understanding of aerosol-radiation feedback on the climate system, potentially reducing uncertainties in climate models related to the distribution and properties of aerosols and clouds over the Tibetan Plateau.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 垂直气溶胶指数提供了一个更可靠的参数来研究气溶胶的气候学。它可以增强对气溶胶-辐射反馈对气候系统影响的理解，可能减少与青藏高原上气溶胶和云的分布及特性相关的气候模型的不确定性。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: How do the methodologies used for quality-checking and validation affect the reliability of aerosol optical property data collected in harsh environments like the Tibetan Plateau?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 用于质量检查和验证的方法如何影响在像西藏高原这样恶劣环境中收集的气溶胶光学特性数据的可靠性。
Interpretation.AnswerEn: The methodologies for quality-checking and validation, such as using passive satellite sensors and ground-based lidar measurements, improve the reliability of aerosol optical property data. These methods ensure higher confidence in characterizing the vertical structure of aerosols, especially in challenging environments like the Tibetan Plateau.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 质量检查和验证的方法，如使用被动卫星传感器和地面激光雷达测量，提高了气溶胶光学特性数据的可靠性。这些方法确保在挑战性环境（如青藏高原）中对气溶胶的垂直结构进行更高信心的表征。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: What potential challenges in data collection might affect the accuracy of long-term aerosol datasets in the Tibetan Plateau?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 在西藏高原，长期气溶胶数据集的准确性可能受到哪些潜在的数据收集挑战的影响？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: Challenges in data collection for the Tibetan Plateau include harsh environmental conditions, which make obtaining long-term in situ aerosol data difficult. Additionally, the lack of a long-term accurate vertical aerosol optical property dataset further complicates understanding the aerosol's effect on the atmospheric energy and water cycle.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 对青藏高原的数据收集面临的挑战包括恶劣的环境条件，这使得获取长期的原位气溶胶数据变得困难。此外，缺乏长期准确的垂直气溶胶光学特性数据集进一步复杂化了对气溶胶对大气能量和水循环影响的理解。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What causes challenges in obtaining long-term in situ aerosol data over the Tibetan Plateau?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 在获取青藏高原长期原位气溶胶数据时，面临的挑战是什么？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The Tibetan Plateau presents harsh environmental conditions that make it highly challenging to collect long-term in situ aerosol data.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 青藏高原的环境条件严酷，使得收集长期的现场气溶胶数据非常具有挑战性。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What factors contribute to the uncertainty in understanding aerosol effects on the atmospheric energy and water cycle over the Tibetan Plateau?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 影响对青藏高原气溶胶对大气能量和水循环影响理解的不确定性因素有哪些？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The lack of a long-term and accurate vertical aerosol optical property dataset over the Tibetan Plateau region significantly contributes to the uncertainty in understanding aerosol effects on the atmospheric energy and water cycle.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 缺乏长期且准确的青藏高原地区垂直气溶胶光学特性数据集，显著增加了对气溶胶对大气能量和水循环影响理解的的不确定性。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What leads to the need for rigorous quality-checking and validation for aerosol datasets in this region?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 在该地区，导致对气溶胶数据集进行严格质量检查和验证的需求的因素是什么？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The necessity for rigorous quality-checking and validation of aerosol datasets arises from the need to ensure higher confidence and reliability in characterizing the vertical structure of aerosols, especially in challenging regions like the Tibetan Plateau.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 对气溶胶数据集进行严格的质量检查和验证的必要性源于确保在表征气溶胶的垂直结构时，特别是在像西藏高原这样具有挑战性的地区，能够提供更高的信心和可靠性。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What are the potential consequences of using a more reliable vertical aerosol index parameter derived from spaceborne-based lidar for understanding aerosol climatology over challenging regions like the Tibetan Plateau?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 使用来自空间激光雷达的更可靠的垂直气溶胶指数参数来理解像青藏高原这样具有挑战性的地区的气溶胶气候学的潜在后果是什么？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: The use of a more reliable vertical aerosol index parameter derived from spaceborne-based lidar can significantly enhance our understanding of aerosol climatology over challenging regions like the Tibetan Plateau. It allows for more accurate characterization of the vertical structure of aerosols, reduces uncertainties in climate models, and provides insights into aerosol-cloud and aerosol-radiation interactions, which are critical for understanding their climate effects.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 使用基于空间激光雷达的更可靠的垂直气溶胶指数参数，可以显著增强我们对像青藏高原这样具有挑战性区域的气溶胶气候学的理解。它允许更准确地表征气溶胶的垂直结构，减少气候模型中的不确定性，并提供对气溶胶-云和气溶胶-辐射相互作用的洞察，这对于理解它们的气候效应至关重要。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What happens to the reliability of aerosol characteristics data after removing low-confidence aerosol target signals from vertical structure datasets?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 在从垂直结构数据集中移除低置信度气溶胶目标信号后，气溶胶特征数据的可靠性会发生什么变化？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: After removing low-confidence aerosol target signals from vertical structure datasets, the reliability of aerosol characteristics data increases, allowing for more accurate retrieval of aerosol patterns and concentrations. This optimization enhances the dataset's ability to reflect true aerosol properties and contributes to reducing uncertainties in climate-related studies over regions like the Tibetan Plateau.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 在从垂直结构数据集中去除低置信度气溶胶目标信号后，气溶胶特征数据的可靠性提高，从而允许更准确地获取气溶胶模式和浓度。这一优化增强了数据集反映真实气溶胶特性的能力，并有助于减少在像青藏高原这样的地区进行气候相关研究时的不确定性。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What is the primary goal of creating a dataset of tropospheric aerosol properties over the Tibetan Plateau using spaceborne Lidar data?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 创建关于青藏 Plateau 的对流层气溶胶特性的卫星激光雷达数据集的主要目标是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The primary goal is to provide a more reliable vertical aerosol index (AI) parameter to investigate the aerosol’s climatology over the Tibetan Plateau. This aims to enhance understanding of aerosol–cloud interaction and aerosol–radiation interaction and their climate effects, thereby reducing uncertainties in climate models.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 主要目标是提供一个更可靠的垂直气溶胶指数（AI）参数，以研究青藏高原的气溶胶气候学。这旨在增强对气溶胶与云的相互作用以及气溶胶与辐射的相互作用及其气候影响的理解，从而减少气候模型中的不确定性。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: Why is it important to employ rigorous quality-checking and validation methods for aerosol data collected over challenging environments like the Tibetan Plateau?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 在像西藏高原这样具有挑战性的环境中，采用严格的质量检查和验证方法对气溶胶数据进行处理是非常重要的。
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: It is important to employ rigorous quality-checking and validation methods to ensure high reliability and accuracy of the aerosol data. This is crucial due to the harsh environmental conditions of the Tibetan Plateau, which make long-term in situ data collection challenging and can lead to uncertainties in the dataset.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 重要的是采用严格的质量检查和验证方法，以确保气溶胶数据的高可靠性和准确性。这一点至关重要，因为青藏 Plateau 的恶劣环境条件使得长期的现场数据收集具有挑战性，并可能导致数据集的不确定性。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What are the intended benefits of comparing the vertical aerosol index dataset with other public datasets in the context of climate modeling?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 在气候建模的背景下，将垂直气溶胶指数数据集与其他公共数据集进行比较的预期好处是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The intended benefits include allowing for comparison and application to the study of climate models and other atmospheric-science-related problems. Comparing datasets can help to increase confidence in the aerosol vertical structural property covariate datasets and improve understanding of the aerosol-cloud-radiation-precipitation interaction and its climate effects.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 预期的好处包括允许对气候模型和其他大气科学相关问题进行比较和应用。比较数据集可以帮助提高对气溶胶垂直结构属性协变量数据集的信心，并改善对气溶胶-云-辐射-降水相互作用及其气候影响的理解。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What methods are used to derive and validate the vertical aerosol index (AI) from satellite and ground-based observations in the Tibetan Plateau region?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 在青藏高原地区，衍生和验证垂直气溶胶指数（AI）的方法包括使用卫星和地面观测数据。
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: The vertical aerosol index (AI) is derived from the aerosol extinction coefficient (EC), which is rigorously quality-checked and validated using passive satellite sensors (MODIS) and ground-based LIDAR measurements. This ensures higher reliability in the aerosol characterization.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 垂直气溶胶指数（AI）是从气溶胶消光系数（EC）中得出的，该系数经过严格的质量检查，并使用被动卫星传感器（MODIS）和地面激光雷达（LIDAR）测量进行了验证。这确保了气溶胶特征的更高可靠性。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: How can researchers overcome the challenges of collecting long-term in situ aerosol data in harsh environments like the Tibetan Plateau?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 研究人员如何克服在像青藏高原这样的恶劣环境中收集长期原位气溶胶数据的挑战？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: The harsh environmental conditions of the Tibetan Plateau make it challenging to collect long-term in situ aerosol data. To address this, researchers utilize spaceborne-based LIDAR systems like CALIOP on CALIPSO, which allows for continuous daytime and nighttime observation of aerosol climatology over the region.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 青藏高原恶劣的环境条件使得收集长期的原位气溶胶数据变得具有挑战性。为了解决这个问题，研究人员利用像CALIPSO上的CALIOP这样的基于卫星的激光雷达系统，这使得对该地区气溶胶气候学的连续白天和夜间观测成为可能。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What procedures are implemented to ensure the reliability and accuracy of aerosol data collected from satellite-based LIDAR systems?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 为了确保从卫星基激光雷达系统收集的气溶胶数据的可靠性和准确性，实施了哪些程序？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: Procedures include removing low-reliability aerosol target signals and rigorously checking and validating the calculated aerosol extinction coefficients against ground-based and passive satellite sensor data. This ensures that the optimized data has higher reliability and is suitable for studying aerosol characteristics and climatology.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 程序包括去除低可靠性的气溶胶目标信号，并严格检查和验证计算得到的气溶胶消光系数与地面和被动卫星传感器数据的一致性。这确保了优化后的数据具有更高的可靠性，适合用于研究气溶胶特征和气候学。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What technological advancements have enabled the collection of reliable vertical aerosol index parameters over challenging environments like the Tibetan Plateau?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 哪些技术进步使得在像西藏高原这样具有挑战性的环境中收集可靠的垂直气溶胶指数参数成为可能？
Enablement.AnswerEn: The use of spaceborne-based Lidar (CALIOP) on board CALIPSO, along with rigorous quality checks and validation against passive satellite sensors (MODIS) and ground-based LIDAR measurements, have enabled the collection of reliable vertical aerosol index parameters over challenging environments like the Tibetan Plateau.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 在CALIPSO卫星上搭载的空间激光雷达（CALIOP）以及与被动卫星传感器（MODIS）和地面激光雷达测量的严格质量检查和验证，使得在像西藏高原这样具有挑战性的环境中收集可靠的垂直气溶胶指数参数成为可能。

Enablement.QuestionEn: How do quality control methods enhance the confidence in datasets characterizing the vertical structure of aerosols in the troposphere?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 质量控制方法如何增强对表征对流层气溶胶垂直结构的数据集的信心。
Enablement.AnswerEn: Standardized quality control methods enhance confidence by ensuring the aerosol vertical structural property covariate datasets are reliable, allowing for comparison and application to climate models and other atmospheric science problems. This involves rigorous quality-checking and validation procedures.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 标准化的质量控制方法通过确保气溶胶垂直结构属性协变量数据集的可靠性来增强信心，从而允许与气候模型和其他大气科学问题进行比较和应用。这涉及严格的质量检查和验证程序。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What conditions are necessary for the effective removal of low-reliability aerosol target signals to improve dataset reliability?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 有效去除低可靠性气溶胶目标信号以提高数据集可靠性所需的条件是什么？
Enablement.AnswerEn: The effective removal of low-reliability aerosol target signals requires rigorous quality-checking and validation processes, including cross-verification with ground-based LIDAR and passive satellite sensors, to obtain aerosol characteristics with higher reliability.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 有效去除低可靠性气溶胶目标信号需要严格的质量检查和验证过程，包括与地面激光雷达和被动卫星传感器的交叉验证，以获得更高可靠性的气溶胶特性。

Expectation.QuestionEn: What are the expected challenges in collecting long-term in situ aerosol data over the Tibetan Plateau, and why might these challenges persist despite technological advances?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 在青藏高原收集长期原位气溶胶数据预期会面临哪些挑战，以及尽管技术进步，这些挑战为何可能依然存在？
Expectation.AnswerEn: The Tibetan Plateau is highly challenging for obtaining long-term in situ aerosol data due to its harsh environmental conditions. These conditions make it difficult to maintain equipment and ensure consistent data collection over time.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 青藏 Plateau由于其恶劣的环境条件，获取长期的原位气溶胶数据非常具有挑战性。这些条件使得维护设备和确保持续的数据收集变得困难。

Expectation.QuestionEn: What could be the reasons for expecting a higher reliability in aerosol characteristic data after removing low-confidence aerosol target signals?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 在去除低置信度气溶胶目标信号后，预计气溶胶特征数据的可靠性更高的原因可能是什么？
Expectation.AnswerEn: After removing the low-reliability aerosol target signals, optimized data is expected to obtain aerosol characteristics with higher reliability due to improved data quality and reduced noise, which facilitates more accurate characterization of aerosol patterns and concentrations.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 在去除低可靠性气溶胶目标信号后，优化的数据预计将获得更高可靠性的气溶胶特征，因为数据质量得到改善，噪声减少，这有助于更准确地表征气溶胶的模式和浓度。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: How would you evaluate the effectiveness of using spaceborne-based lidar systems like CALIOP for collecting long-term aerosol data over challenging environments like the Tibetan Plateau?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 如何评估使用基于太空的激光雷达系统（如CALIOP）在像西藏高原这样具有挑战性环境中收集长期气溶胶数据的有效性？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: The use of spaceborne-based lidar systems like CALIOP is highly effective for collecting long-term aerosol data over challenging environments like the Tibetan Plateau. This effectiveness is demonstrated by the agreement of the vertical aerosol index (AI) dataset with ground-based lidar measurements and the improved reliability of aerosol characteristics obtained after removing low-reliability signals.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 使用基于太空的激光雷达系统，如CALIOP，在像西藏高原这样具有挑战性的环境中收集长期气溶胶数据非常有效。这种有效性通过垂直气溶胶指数（AI）数据集与地面激光雷达测量结果的一致性得以体现，并且在去除低可靠性信号后，获得的气溶胶特征的可靠性得到了改善。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: What is your opinion on the challenges faced in achieving accurate vertical aerosol optical property datasets in harsh environments, and how can these be addressed?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 我对在恶劣环境中实现准确的垂直气溶胶光学特性数据集所面临的挑战的看法是什么，以及如何解决这些问题？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: The primary challenge in achieving accurate vertical aerosol optical property datasets in harsh environments like the Tibetan Plateau is the environmental difficulty in obtaining long-term in situ data. These challenges can be addressed by employing rigorous quality-checking and validation methods with passive satellite sensors like MODIS and ground-based lidar measurements to ensure higher confidence in the data.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 在像青藏高原这样的恶劣环境中，获得准确的垂直气溶胶光学特性数据集的主要挑战是获取长期的现场数据的环境困难。这些挑战可以通过采用严格的质量检查和验证方法来解决，例如使用被动卫星传感器（如MODIS）和地面激光雷达测量，以确保数据的更高可信度。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: In your view, what are the potential benefits of integrating standardized quality control methods in aerosol data collection for improving climate model predictions?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 在我看来，将标准化的质量控制方法整合到气溶胶数据收集中，对于改善气候模型预测的潜在好处包括：
Judgmental.AnswerEn: Integrating standardized quality control methods in aerosol data collection can significantly improve climate model predictions by providing more reliable and consistent datasets. This approach allows for better characterization of aerosol vertical structures, enabling more accurate analyses of aerosol-cloud and aerosol-radiation interactions, ultimately reducing uncertainties in climate projections.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 在气溶胶数据收集中整合标准化的质量控制方法可以显著提高气候模型预测的准确性，因为这提供了更可靠和一致的数据集。这种方法允许更好地表征气溶胶的垂直结构，从而能够更准确地分析气溶胶与云和气溶胶与辐射的相互作用，最终减少气候预测中的不确定性。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I can't make sense of how data collection methods can overcome the challenges posed by harsh environmental conditions on the Tibetan Plateau.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我无法理解数据收集方法如何克服青藏高原恶劣环境条件带来的挑战。
Assertion.AnswerEn: The Tibetan Plateau's harsh environmental conditions make it difficult to obtain long-term in situ aerosol data. However, the use of spaceborne-based lidar, such as CALIOP on board CALIPSO, allows for the collection of more reliable data on aerosol properties over the plateau. Ground-based lidar measurements are also used for data validation, helping to ensure the accuracy of the collected data.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 青藏高原的恶劣环境条件使得获取长期的原位气溶胶数据变得困难。然而，使用空间基激光雷达，如搭载在CALIPSO上的CALIOP，可以更可靠地收集高原上气溶胶特性的相关数据。地面激光雷达测量也被用于数据验证，帮助确保所收集数据的准确性。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I don't understand how datasets can be effectively validated and compared for aerosol research in such a challenging region.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我不明白在这样一个具有挑战性的地区，如何有效地验证和比较气溶胶研究的数据集。
Assertion.AnswerEn: Datasets can be validated through rigorous quality-checking processes and by comparing them with both passive satellite sensors like MODIS and ground-based lidar observations. This dual approach helps to ensure the accuracy and reliability of the aerosol dataset, allowing for effective characterization of aerosol vertical structures and enabling comparisons with other public datasets.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 数据集可以通过严格的质量检查过程进行验证，并与被动卫星传感器如MODIS和地面激光雷达观测进行比较。这种双重方法有助于确保气溶胶数据集的准确性和可靠性，从而有效表征气溶胶的垂直结构，并能够与其他公共数据集进行比较。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please outline the data collection methods used for obtaining long-term vertical aerosol optical property datasets over challenging environments like the Tibetan Plateau.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 请概述用于获取像西藏高原这样具有挑战性环境的长期垂直气溶胶光学特性数据集的数据收集方法。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: The data collection method involves using a spaceborne-based Lidar (CALIOP) on board CALIPSO to derive a new vertical aerosol index (AI) parameter. The aerosol extinction coefficient (EC) is rigorously quality-checked and validated with passive satellite sensors (MODIS) and ground-based LIDAR measurements, ensuring the reliability of the datasets.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 数据收集方法涉及使用搭载在CALIPSO上的空间基激光雷达（CALIOP）来推导新的垂直气溶胶指数（AI）参数。气溶胶消光系数（EC）经过严格的质量检查，并与被动卫星传感器（MODIS）和地面激光雷达测量进行验证，确保数据集的可靠性。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please discuss the challenges faced in collecting accurate and long-term aerosol data in harsh environments and how these challenges are addressed.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 讨论在恶劣环境中收集准确和长期气溶胶数据所面临的挑战，以及如何应对这些挑战。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: The harsh environmental conditions of the Tibetan Plateau pose significant challenges for obtaining long-term in situ aerosol data. These challenges are addressed by using spaceborne Lidar technology, which provides reliable data despite the environmental difficulties. Additionally, low-reliability aerosol target signals are removed to optimize data quality, ensuring higher reliability of the aerosol characteristics obtained from the dataset.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 青藏高原恶劣的环境条件对获取长期的原位气溶胶数据构成了重大挑战。这些挑战通过使用空间激光雷达技术得以解决，该技术能够在环境困难的情况下提供可靠的数据。此外，低可靠性的气溶胶目标信号被去除，以优化数据质量，从而确保从数据集中获得的气溶胶特征具有更高的可靠性。
